# Re-covered
Repository of a minecraft resource pack [Re-covered](https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/enchanted-books-re-covered) meant for feedback & discussions.

## Modrinth Description

<details>
<summary>About</summary>

**Re-covered** gives new textures to enchanted books, aimed to have individual and intuitive appearance.\
This pack tries to be as vanilla as possible and the textures are meant to represent what the enchantments actually do. Never again should you spend minutes digging through your chests in search of that one enchantment hidden behind a tooltip.

<details>
<summary>Texture Lore</summary>

A general rule for each texture is to have a book cover a librarian villager could have plausibly designed,\
thus mandating the designs to be understandable also to the villagers rather than just to the player,\
and therefore making the textures more integrated with the Minecraft's universe.

</details>


<details>
<summary>Multiple Enchantments on a Single Book</summary>

Each enchantment is ranked within a hierarchy of significance.\
When an enchanted book contains two or more enchantments, the texture of enchantment ranked higher than the other ones is displayed.\
[Give feedback](https://github.com/carl-classic/Re-covered/issues/new)

![A hierarchy of textures listed in a numbered list](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/dda63d8b17249f825b1d88612c4b4faf42642857.png)



</details>



</details>


<details>
<summary>Supported Minecraft versions</summary>
  
| Version             | Requirements          |
|--------------------:|:--------------------- |
| 1.21.5              | no mods required              |
| 1.21.4 - 1.18       | requires [Optifine](https://optifine.net/home) or [CIT Resewn](https://modrinth.com/mod/cit-resewn) in order to work |

</details>

![Image showing all books](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/6gN7YVi7/images/a378ec3c742b55df4ad1f42120c1a3a0533da620.png)

</details>
